name: Chiliville Chili
author: From the Kitchen at Johnsonville Sausage
summary: Steaming, succulent and savory. A robust and hearty classic that never goes out of style.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package Johnsonville® Italian Ground Mild, Sweet or Hot Italian Sausage
3 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with green peppers and onions
2 (16 ounce) cans kidney beans, rinsed and drained
½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
directions: In a Dutch oven, cook sausage and ground beef over medium heat until meat is cooked and browned; drain
Stir in onion, celery and garlic
Add tomatoes, beans, broth, tomato paste, sugar, chili powder, Worcestershire sauce, cumin and red pepper flakes
Bring to a boil; reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally
Serve with cheese, sour cream and onion
